projects.title: Complete Roof Replacement
projects.description: Full tear-off and replacement with Class 4 impact-resistant shingles after hail damage. Insurance claim handled start to finish.

projects.title: Tile Roof Restoration
projects.description: Restored a 25-year-old clay tile roof. Replaced broken tiles, resealed underlayment, and cleaned entire surface.

projects.title: Commercial Flat Roof
projects.description: TPO membrane installation on a 10,000 sq ft commercial building. Energy-efficient white membrane for maximum cooling.

projects.title: Emergency Storm Repair
projects.description: Emergency tarping and repair after monsoon wind damage. Prevented interior water damage with same-day response.

projects.title: Cool Roof Coating
projects.description: Applied reflective elastomeric coating to a flat roof. Building temperature dropped 15°F and energy costs reduced 25%.

projects.title: Skylight Installation
projects.description: Installed 3 Velux solar-powered skylights with flashing kits. Added natural light to a dark hallway and two bathrooms.
